content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Coal Mining Operation at Position (41.0, -86.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position 41.0, -86.0) and wooden chest (position 41.5, -84.5)
- Burner mining drill (position 43.0, -86.0) and wooden chest (position 43.5, -84.5)
- Burner inserter (position 42.5, -84.5) connecting the two chests

#### Iron Ore Mining Operation at Position (4.0, -60.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position 4.0, -60.0) and wooden chest (position 4.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest (position 4.5, -56.5)

#### Iron Ore Mining Operation at Position (-17.0, -52.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position -17.0, -52.0) and wooden chest (position -16.5, -50.5)
- Stone furnace (position -15.0, -51.0) and stone furnace (position -13.0, -50.0)
- Wooden chest (position -13.5, -51.5) and wooden chest (position -13.5, -48.5)
- Wooden chest (position -11.5, -48.5)

#### Coal Storage Area at Position (41.5, -82.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest (position 41.5, -82.5)
- Wooden chest (position 41.5, -80.5)
- Wooden chest (position 41.5, -81.5)
- Wooden chest (position 43.5, -80.5)
- Wooden chest (position 45.5, -80.5)
- Wooden chest (position 41.5, -79.5)
- Wooden chest (position 41.5, -77.5)
- Wooden chest (position 43.5, -76.5)
- Wooden chest (position 43.5, -74.5)
- Wooden chest (position 41.5, -73.5)
- Wooden chest (position 43.5, -73.5)

### ERROR TIPS

#### Errors when extracting items from a full chest
- Ensure the chest has enough space before attempting to extract items.

#### Errors when placing items into a full chest
- Ensure the chest has enough space before attempting to place items.

#### Errors when mining with no fuel
- Ensure the burner mining drills are fueled before attempting to mine.

#### Errors when smelting with no ingredients
- Ensure the furnaces have the necessary ingredients before attempting to smelt.

#### Errors when inserting items into a full chest
- Ensure the destination chest has enough space before attempting to insert items.

### NAMESPACE

#### Utility Functions
- `extract_item(Prototype.Coal, chest, quantity=200)`: Attempts to extract coal from a chest. Fails if the chest is full or does not contain the specified item.

#### Important Variables
- `transport-belt`: 13
- `burner-inserter`: 9
- `wood`: 12
- `stone`: 5
- `iron-ore`: 2330
- `iron-plate`: 2900
